backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with access control, blob storage mixins, and data models for users, documents, benches, components, and history.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Production deployment checklist for Draft Version 36 detailing required environment variables, build steps, and backend health checks.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V47: Production deployment checklist for Draft Version 47 covering environment verification, build preparation, and backend readiness.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V48: Deployment checklist for Draft Version 48 outlining required environment variables and mainnet verification steps.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V51: Deployment checklist for Draft Version 51 describing required environment variables and production verification commands.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining global theme variables for light and dark modes and basic styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point embedding the app root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/README_PRODUCTION_ENV.md: Documentation of required production environment variables for frontend builds, including canister IDs, Internet Identity URL, and network config.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Smoke test script for Draft Version 36 validating authentication, navigation, and profile flows after production deployment.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V47: Step-by-step smoke test script for validating authentication, protected routes, and user profile persistence for Draft Version 47.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V48: Detailed production smoke test procedures for Draft Version 48 covering authentication, profile setup, and persistence with required diagnostics.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V51: Smoke test procedures for Draft Version 51 mirroring V48 tests, focusing on authentication, profile creation, and data persistence.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_RESULTS_V: Template for recording smoke test results for Draft Version 36, including sign‑in test status and notes.
Template for documenting results of the Draft Version 47 smoke test, mainly covering Internet Identity sign‑in.
Unified results template for smoke tests of Draft Versions 48 and 51, including authentication and initial access outcomes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application setup configuring routing, theming, error boundaries, and protected page layouts.
Authorization gate that checks admin privileges and conditionally renders admin content or an access‑denied message.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that displays an error alert and reload option when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Checks backend actor availability, showing a loading spinner or error alert before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Ensures user authentication via Internet Identity, redirecting or prompting login when needed.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Renders a list of draggable items with visual feedback and drag event handlers.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Provides state and handlers to reorder items through drag-and-drop interactions.
frontend/src/components/export/ExportDia: Displays export options, validates selections, and triggers data export in various formats.
Defines the main app layout with navigation, theme toggle, profile menu, and export dialog.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows floating buttons to quickly scroll to the top or bottom based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Manages a single entity tag with input, suggestions, and add/remove interactions.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Displays a grid of selectable predefined avatars with visual selection highlighting.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar from predefined or custom sources with cache busting support.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
Zustand store that tracks a timestamp to force avatar cache refreshes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists the user's preferred dashboard chart type in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportDialogData.t: Fetches benches and unique component names for the export dialog once an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication, state management, and AuthClient integration via React context.
Periodically calls updateLastSeen on the actor to record user activity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on benches, profiles, expiration settings, and related data.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Manages language selection, initialization, and persistence using backend values or localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported languages and helpers to validate, name, and display them.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Provides translation strings for supported languages, primarily English.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Custom hook for translation lookup with fallback and key humanization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin page with tabs for benches, documents, and users.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Displays all test benches with delete functionality and loading states.
Lists documents with metadata and provides download support.
Shows the current user's profile and preference settings.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Displays details for a specific bench with components, history, and edit/remove actions.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Shows a searchable list of benches with an option to add new ones.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal component for creating a new test bench with fields for metadata, tags, documents, components, validation, and file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Editor table for adding, editing, removing, and duplicating bench components with expiration status tracking.
Manages bench documents including loading, uploading, editing, duplicating, deleting, and categorizing files.
Displays a chronological history of bench actions with user info, timestamps, and optional details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error handling, falling back to a placeholder on failure.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Form input for managing document categories and associated files, supporting adding, removing, and versioning.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog allowing users to select multiple benches and duplicate a component to them using mutation hooks. Handles selection, submission, error handling, and UI feedback.
Dialog for duplicating a document to selected benches that don’t already contain it, with loading states and translation support. Uses mutation hooks and displays validation and success toasts.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Dialog enabling users to edit a bench document’s metadata and optionally upload a replacement file. Manages file uploads, progress tracking, validation, and save mutation.
Form modal for editing a bench’s details, tags, URLs, description, and photo, with validation and optional photo upload. Submits updates through a mutation and displays errors or success.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Mo: Dialog for moving a component from one bench to another by selecting a single destination bench. Handles validation, mutation, and success/error notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: React tag input component supporting adding, removing, and selecting tags with suggestions and a popover UI.
Placeholder page for creating a new test bench, showing an upcoming form and listing planned features.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Processes bench movement history to count source‑destination transfers and displays them as a ranked flow list with progress bars.
Aggregates component expiration statuses and renders them as a pie chart with OK, expiring, and expired segments.
Builds per‑bench expiration status counts and displays them in a bar chart grouped by OK, expiring soon, and expired.
Groups components by expiration date ranges and visualizes the distribution in a bar chart.
Counts documents by category and displays the distribution as a pie chart.
Aggregates components by expiration month and displays the trend as either a bar or line chart.
Calculates per-bench expired component counts and displays them in either a bar or line chart with i18n support.
Computes overall component health percentages and renders a gauge-like set of progress bars.
Assembles and orders all dashboard statistics charts using drag-and-drop and prepares data for each chart component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads dashboard data, manages section ordering, and renders main dashboard sections including statistics and movement flow.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Handles user profile editing, including personal info, expiration thresholds, avatar selection, and language settings.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Provides a login interface using Internet Identity with error handling and automatic redirect when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/Users/UserProfileDeta: Displays a public user profile by principal ID, handling loading, errors, and invalid IDs, and shows avatar, username, and entity details.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Defines a static map of avatar IDs to image paths and provides helpers to lookup an avatar path or list all IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file by converting it into an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and returns a default bench placeholder image as an ExternalBlob, with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides utilities to download documents or arbitrary blobs by creating temporary object URLs.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes various error types into user-friendly messages, mapping common backend errors to clearer text.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration threshold settings, including localStorage persistence and utilities to compute expiration status.
frontend/src/utils/export/benchExpertZip: Generates a text-based export of bench expert data, assembling bench, component, and movement details into a downloadable file.
Filters export payloads based on selected benches, components, and history options, building structured filtered results.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportGenerato: Implements CSV, TXT, and SQLite export generation for filtered data and triggers file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/export/sqliteExport.t: Dynamically loads sql.js and builds a SQLite database containing benches, components, and history tables.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a unique ID using the current timestamp and a random string segment.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Cleans and normalizes bench descriptions by adjusting spacing, capitalization, punctuation, and common abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Performs case‑insensitive multi-term search across bench names, codes, descriptions, and tag names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates emails, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs with simple rule-based checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: Defines TypeScript config for Node-related build files with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, environment variable loading, path aliases, dev server proxying, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, approved features, metadata, and versioning for deployment planning.
